description: I use python in programming competitions and I taught Python over several months.
I completed assignments in Java for high school and University courses.
I also have worked in Java Spring Framework for creating or modifying microservices.
I use HTML and CSS when teaching Hello Code and have done a lot of research for teaching this course.
I have used Git on my projects and a majority of the projects I've used in industry used Git.
I use Postman when testing my services.
I also used Postman when demonstrating RESTful APIs in my presentation for a UNO ACM club meeting.
I have used Jira for Agile development in most of my work experiences.
